text: Ne nibasomelwa tsinyaali tsiefu tsili habulafu, balia abalaritsanga okhubukana ninafu baboolanga mbu; “Lera Ikuruani ilali ino, nohomba oyikalukhanie(hatiti)” Boola; “Shenyala okhuyikalukhania khukhwenya khwanje tawe, esie shenondanga halali kalia kefimbulilungwa. Toto esie eritsanga nengosela Nyasaye wanje, eshinyasio shieyinyanga ikhongo
